data.name: Rocket League® – Fast & Furious™ '70 Dodge® Charger R/T
data.detailed_description:
Cruise the pitch with Dom Toretto’s 1970 Dodge Charger R/T from Universal Pictures', The Fast and the Furious™.


WARNING: The driving sequences in the motion picture Fast & Furious were filmed with professional stunt drivers, under carefully-controlled conditions, for entertainment purposes only. No attempt should be made to duplicate any of the racing activities or sequences depicted therein.
data.about_the_game:
Cruise the pitch with Dom Toretto’s 1970 Dodge Charger R/T from Universal Pictures', The Fast and the Furious™.


WARNING: The driving sequences in the motion picture Fast & Furious were filmed with professional stunt drivers, under carefully-controlled conditions, for entertainment purposes only. No attempt should be made to duplicate any of the racing activities or sequences depicted therein.
data.short_description: Cruise the pitch with Dom Toretto’s 1970 Dodge Charger R/T from Universal Pictures', The Fast and the Furious™.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Turkish, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Iris Pro Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.4 GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M, Intel HD Graphics 4000 or Iris Pro Graphics
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: 2.4+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 260 or ATI 4850
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 or better, ATI 7950 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad or Controller Recommended
